remarks: The union of two connected overlapping subspaces is connected. (Contributed by FL, 29-May-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jun-2014.)
statement: uncon $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ ( A C_ X /\ B C_ X ) /\ ( A i^i B ) =/= (/) ) -> ( ( ( J |`t A ) e. Con /\ ( J |`t B ) e. Con ) -> ( J |`t ( A u. B ) ) e. Con ) ) $.
